jobs.description:
Senior Python Developer

Company: TechCorp Solutions
Location: San Francisco, CA (Remote Available)

About Us:
TechCorp Solutions is a leading software development company specializing in AI-powered enterprise solutions. We're building the next generation of intelligent applications that help businesses make better decisions.

Job Description:
We are seeking an experienced Python Developer to join our growing team. The ideal candidate will have strong experience in building scalable applications and working with AI/ML technologies.

Requirements:
- 5+ years of experience in Python development
- Strong knowledge of web frameworks (Django, FastAPI)
- Experience with AI/ML libraries (TensorFlow, PyTorch)
- Proficient in SQL and database design
- Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP)
- Strong understanding of software design patterns
- Experience with microservices architecture

Responsibilities:
- Design and implement scalable Python applications
- Work with AI/ML teams to integrate machine learning models
- Optimize application performance and scalability
- Write clean, maintainable, and well-tested code
- Mentor junior developers and conduct code reviews
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams

Qualifications:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
- Strong problem-solving and analytical skills
- Excellent communication and teamwork abilities
- Experience with agile development methodologies

AI/ML Engineer

Company: AI Innovations
Location: Remote

About Us:
AI Innovations is at the forefront of artificial intelligence and machine learning solutions. We develop cutting-edge AI applications for enterprise clients.

Job Description:
We're looking for an AI/ML Engineer to join our team in building next-generation AI solutions.

Requirements:
- Strong experience with Python and ML frameworks
- Expertise in PyTorch or TensorFlow
- Experience with LLMs and transformer architectures
- Strong understanding of statistical modeling
- Experience with cloud ML platforms

Responsibilities:
- Develop and deploy ML models
- Optimize model performance
- Work on NLP and computer vision projects
- Collaborate with research teams

Qualifications:
- MS/PhD in Computer Science, AI, or related field
- 3+ years of industry experience
- Strong publication record is a plus
